entities.name: hermione

entities.name: harry

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who is trying to reason with Harry.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as the one who is debating with George about how Dumbledore might stop people under 17 from entering the tournament.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as the one who is being debated by Fred.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who knows that Harry and his friends are not of age.

entities.name: tournament
entities.description: The tournament is mentioned as the event that people under 17 are trying to enter.

relationships.description: Fred and George are debating about how Dumbledore might stop people under 17 from entering the tournament.
Dumbledore knows that Harry is not of age.
Fred suggests to George that they use a couple of drops of Aging Potion.
